panels.description: Cumulative count of packets transmitted
panels.title: Cumulative Transmission (Packet)

panels.description: (Count of dropped packets) / (Packets of transmission), in the time range
panels.title: Transmission Error Rate (Packet)

panels.description: Cumulative count of bytes transmitted
panels.title: Cumulative Transmission (Byte)

panels.description: (Count of errors) / (Bytes of transmission), in the time range
panels.title: Transmission Error Rate (Byte)

panels.description: Cumulative count of packets received
panels.title: Cumulative Receipt (Packet)

panels.description: (Count of dropped packets) / (Packets of receipt), in the time range
panels.title: Receipt Error Rate (Packet)

panels.description: Cumulative count of bytes received
panels.title: Cumulative Receipt (Byte)

panels.description: (Count of errors) / (Bytes of receipt), in the time range
panels.title: Receipt Error Rate (Byte)

panels.description: Size of current working set / total memory usage
panels.title: Size

panels.description: Maximum memory usage recorded
panels.title: Maximum

panels.description: Current memory saturation (usage / limit) for the container
panels.title: Saturation

panels.description: Count of memory allocation failures in the time range
panels.title: Allocation Failure

panels.description: Number of memory usage hits limits in the time range
panels.title: Limit Hit

panels.description: User cpu time consumed in the time range
panels.title: User Time

panels.description: Cpu time consumed in the time range
panels.title: Real Time

panels.description: System cpu time consumed in the time range
panels.title: System Time

panels.description: Average load of  CPU in the last 10s (The spark line shows the history information)
panels.title: Load

panels.description: Count of reads completed in the time range. The spark line shows cumulative count of reads completed.
panels.title: Reads Completed

panels.description: Count of writes completed in the time range. The spark line shows cumulative count of writes completed.
panels.title: Writes Completed

panels.description: Number of I/Os currently in progress.
panels.title: IO Current

panels.description:
The total number of current inodes.
The spark line shows history information.
panels.title: Inodes Total

panels.description: Cumulative count of seconds spent doing I/Os, reading, and writing from the container was created.
panels.title: Cumulative Time

panels.description: (usage / limit) of the current file system.
panels.title: Saturation

panels.description: Cumulative count of read/write.
panels.title: Cumulativev Count of Read/Write

panels.description: Start time of the container since unix epoch
panels.title: Start Time
